songs.title: A Sky Full of Stars (Live In Buenos Aires)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
'Cause you’re a sky, 'cause you're a sky full of stars
I’m gonna give you my heart
'Cause you're a sky, 'cause you're a sky full of stars
And 'cause you light up my path
I send this out to my dad and my mom, let's go

[Chorus]
I don't care, go on and tear me apart
I don’t care if you do, ooh-ooh, ooh
’Cause in a sky, 'cause in a sky full of stars
I think I saw you

[Verse 2]
’Cause you're a sky, 'cause you're a sky full of stars
I want to die in your arms, oh, oh, oh
’Cause you get lighter the more it gets dark, yes
I'm gonna give you my heart
Come on, come on, come on, come on

[Chorus]
I don't care, go on and tear me apart
I don't care if you do, ooh-ooh, ooh
'Cause in a sky, 'cause in a sky full of stars
I think I saw you
I think I saw you

[Outro]
'Cause you're a sky, you're a sky full of stars
Such a heavenly view
You're such a heavenly view
Yeah, yeah, yeah, oh, ooh
Muchísimas gracias amigos, amigas
Thank you so much everyone
[?]
